sql.isNotEmpty: u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID in ( select reqdtl.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL reqdtl where reqdtl.FROM_BILL_ID in( select indtl.STOREIN_ID from DRP_STOREIN_DTL indtl where indtl.GOODS_ORDER_NO like '%'||#GOODS_ORDER_NO#||'%') )
u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID in (select a.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID in (select a.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID in (select a.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.RETURN_STORE_ID, u.RETURN_STORE_NO, u.RETURN_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.AREA_SER_ID, u.AREA_SER_NO, u.AREA_SER_NAME from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${SYSSCHEMA}.DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ( PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID, PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO, BILL_TYPE, RETURN_CHANN_ID, RETURN_CHANN_NO, RETURN_CHANN_NAME, RECV_CHANN_ID, RECV_CHANN_NO, RECV_CHANN_NAME, RETURN_STORE_ID, RETURN_STORE_NO, RETURN_STORE_NAME, DEL_FLAG, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, UPDATOR, UPD_NAME, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, AREA_SER_ID, AREA_SER_NO, AREA_SER_NAME )values( #PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID#, #PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO#, #BILL_TYPE#, #RETURN_CHANN_ID#, #RETURN_CHANN_NO#, #RETURN_CHANN_NAME#, #RECV_CHANN_ID#, #RECV_CHANN_NO#, #RECV_CHANN_NAME#, #RETURN_STORE_ID#, #RETURN_STORE_NO#, #RETURN_STORE_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #UPDATOR#, #UPD_NAME#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #AREA_SER_ID#, #AREA_SER_NO#, #AREA_SER_NAME# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ
PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO = #PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO# BILL_TYPE = #BILL_TYPE# RETURN_CHANN_NO = #RETURN_CHANN_NO# RETURN_CHANN_NAME = #RETURN_CHANN_NAME# RECV_CHANN_NO = #RECV_CHANN_NO# RECV_CHANN_NAME = #RECV_CHANN_NAME# RETURN_STORE_NO = #RETURN_STORE_NO# RETURN_STORE_NAME = #RETURN_STORE_NAME# REMARK = #REMARK# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME = sysdate LEDGER_ID = #LEDGER_ID# LEDGER_NAME = #LEDGER_NAME# STATE = #STATE#
where PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID = #PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID = #PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, u.RETURN_STORE_ID, u.RETURN_STORE_NO, u.RETURN_STORE_NAME, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ u where u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID = #PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, c.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, c.SPCL_SPEC_REMARK, c.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.RETURN_PRICE, u.RETURN_NUM, u.RETURN_AMOUNT, u.RETURN_RSON_TYPE, u.RETURN_RSON, u.RETURN_ATT, u.DEL_FLAG, ( select sum(NVL(STORE_NUM, 0) - NVL(FREEZE_NUM, 0)) MAX_RETURN_NUM from DRP_STORE_ACCT aa, DRP_STORE b where aa.STORE_ID = b.STORE_ID and aa.STORE_ID = a.RETURN_STORE_ID and aa.PRD_ID = u.PRD_ID and NVL(aa.SPCL_TECH_ID,'NONL') = NVL(u.SPCL_TECH_ID,'NONL') and aa.LEDGER_ID=a.LEDGER_ID ) MAX_RETURN_NUM, NVL(u.USE_TIME,0) USE_TIME, u.SHIP_POINT_ID, u.SHIP_POINT_NO, u.SHIP_POINT_NAME, to_char(u.PRDC_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PRDC_DATE, p.PAR_PRD_NAME, (u.PRD_ID || c.SPCL_TECH_ID)CHECKONLY from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL u left join BASE_PRODUCT p on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID left join DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ a on u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID = a.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH c on c.SPCL_TECH_ID = u.SPCL_TECH_ID and USE_FLAG=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL( PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_ID, PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID, FROM_BILL_ID, FROM_BILL_NO, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, RETURN_PRICE, RETURN_NUM, RETURN_AMOUNT, RETURN_RSON_TYPE, RETURN_RSON, RETURN_ATT, DEL_FLAG, SPCL_TECH_ID, USE_TIME, SHIP_POINT_ID, SHIP_POINT_NO, SHIP_POINT_NAME, PRDC_DATE )values( #PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_ID#, #PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID#, #FROM_BILL_ID#, #FROM_BILL_NO#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #RETURN_PRICE#, #RETURN_NUM#, #RETURN_AMOUNT#, #RETURN_RSON_TYPE#, #RETURN_RSON#, #RETURN_ATT#, #DEL_FLAG#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #USE_TIME#, #SHIP_POINT_ID#, #SHIP_POINT_NO#, #SHIP_POINT_NAME#, to_date(#PRDC_DATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd') )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL
FROM_BILL_NO = #FROM_BILL_NO# PRD_ID = #PRD_ID# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# BRAND = #BRAND# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# RETURN_PRICE = #RETURN_PRICE# RETURN_NUM = #RETURN_NUM# RETURN_AMOUNT = #RETURN_AMOUNT# RETURN_RSON_TYPE = #RETURN_RSON_TYPE# RETURN_RSON = #RETURN_RSON# RETURN_ATT = #RETURN_ATT# USE_TIME = #USE_TIME# SHIP_POINT_ID = #SHIP_POINT_ID# SHIP_POINT_NO = #SHIP_POINT_NO# SHIP_POINT_NAME = #SHIP_POINT_NAME# PRDC_DATE = to_date(#PRDC_DATE#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
where PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_ID = #PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_ID in ($PRD_RETURN_DTL_REQ_IDS$)
update DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID = #PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select STORAGE_FLAG from DRP_STORE where STORE_ID=#STORE_ID#

select u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.STATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG, u.AREA_SER_ID, u.AREA_SER_NO, u.AREA_SER_NAME, b.PRD_NO, b.PRD_NAME, b.PRD_SPEC, b.PRD_COLOR, b.BRAND, b.STD_UNIT, t.SPCL_DTL_REMARK, b.RETURN_NUM, b.RETURN_PRICE, b.RETURN_AMOUNT, b.RETURN_RSON_TYPE, b.RETURN_RSON, b.USE_TIME, b.SHIP_POINT_NAME from DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ u left join DRP_PRD_RETURN_REQ_DTL b on u.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID = b.PRD_RETURN_REQ_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH t on b.SPCL_TECH_ID = t.SPCL_TECH_ID
